languages.text: Ужасы Комморры остались позади. Отряд Вольного Торговца ждал долгий путь, возможный только с помощью ксенопроводника — из одних врат в другие, через безумные и неведомые миры, сводившие с ума от одного взгляда на них.

traits.locale_text: Ужасы Комморры остались позади. Отряд Вольного Торговца ждал долгий путь – из одних врат в другие, через безумные и неведомые миры, сводившие с ума от одного взгляда на них. Только благодаря ксенопроводнику Лорд-капитан со своей свитой сумели найти выход из лабиринта чуждых потерянных планет, по которым вела дорога из многочисленных врат Паутины.

languages.text: With the physical horrors of Commorragh behind them, a long and arduous journey, possible only with the help of a xenos guide, lay ahead for the Rogue Trader and h{mf|is|er} party: from one strange destination to the next, through unknowable environments, the mere sight of which could drive one to madness.
languages.original_text: Ужасы Комморры остались позади. Отряд Вольного Торговца ждал долгий путь, возможный только с помощью ксенопроводника — из одних врат в другие, через безумные и неведомые миры, сводившие с ума от одного взгляда на них.

traits.locale_text: The horrors of Commorragh had been left behind. A long journey lay ahead for the Rogue Trader and h{mf|is|er} party: from one gate to the next, through bizarre uncharted worlds whose mere sight could drive one to madness. It was only with help from a Xenos guide that the Lord Captain and h{mf|im|er} retinue found their way out of a maze of lost alien planets across which lay the path weaving between the many Webway Gates.

The horrors of Commorragh had been left behind. A long journey lay ahead for the Rogue Trader and h{mf|is|er} party: from one gate to the next, through bizarre uncharted worlds whose mere sight could drive one to madness. It was only with help from a Xenos guide that the Lord Captain and h{mf|im|er} retinue found their way out of a maze of lost alien planets across which lay the path weaving between the many Webway Gates.

The horrors of Commorragh were left behind. A long journey lay ahead for the Rogue Trader and h{mf|is|er} party: from one gate to the next, through bizarre uncharted worlds, the mere sight of which could drive one to madness. It was only with help from a xenos guide that the Lord Captain and h{mf|is|er} retinue found their way out of the maze of lost alien planets linked by the path between the Webway Gates.

The horrors of Commorragh were left behind. A long journey lay ahead for the Rogue Trader and h{mf|is|er} party: from one gate to the next, through bizarre uncharted worlds, the mere sight of which could drive one to madness. It was only with help from a xenos guide that the Lord Captain and h{mf|is|er} retinue found their way out of the maze of lost alien planets linked by the path between the Webway Gates.

With the physical horrors of Commorragh behind them, a long and arduous journey, possible only with the help of a xenos guide, lay ahead for the Rogue Trader and h{mf|is|er} party: from one strange destination to the next, through unknowable environments, the mere sight of which could drive one to madness.

languages.text: 科摩罗的恐怖旅程已经结束，行商浪人与{mf|他|她}的船员将会在异形向导的带领下，踏上一段漫长而艰辛的旅程，从某个未知之地前往另一处陌生的地方。这段旅程将会穿过无人知晓的区域，光是看到旅途中的景象，就足以把人逼疯。
languages.original_text: With the physical horrors of Commorragh behind them, a long and arduous journey, possible only with the help of a xenos guide, lay ahead for the Rogue Trader and h{mf|is|er} party: from one strange destination to the next, through unknowable environments, the mere sight of which could drive one to madness.

traits.locale_text: 科摩罗的恐怖旅程已经结束，行商浪人与{mf|他|她}的船员将会踏上一段漫长而艰辛的旅程，从某个未知之地前往另一处陌生的地方。这段旅程将会穿过无人知晓的区域，光是看到旅途中的景象，就足以把人逼疯。只有在异形向导的协助之下，领主舰长与{mf|他|她}的随行人员才能离开这座由神秘网道与无数失落异星构成的迷宫，逃出这片恐怖之地。

languages.text: Dejando atrás los horrores de Commorragh un largo y arduo viaje posibilitado solo por un guía xenos esperaba a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y a su grupo. De un destino extraño al siguiente, atravesaron entornos inefables que volverían loco a quien los contemplara.
languages.original_text: With the physical horrors of Commorragh behind them, a long and arduous journey, possible only with the help of a xenos guide, lay ahead for the Rogue Trader and h{mf|is|er} party: from one strange destination to the next, through unknowable environments, the mere sight of which could drive one to madness.

traits.locale_text: Dejando atrás los horrores de Commorragh un largo y arduo viaje posibilitado solo por un guía xenos esperaba a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y a su grupo. De un destino extraño al siguiente, atravesaron entornos inefables que volverían loco a quien los contemplara.

languages.text: コモラフの実体を持った脅威がローグトレーダーとその一行の背後に迫り、目の前にはゼノの案内なくしては開かない、長く険しい旅路が待ち受けていた。次から次へと足を踏み入れる未知の目的地と予測できない環境は、見ているだけで気が狂いそうだ。
languages.original_text: With the physical horrors of Commorragh behind them, a long and arduous journey, possible only with the help of a xenos guide, lay ahead for the Rogue Trader and h{mf|is|er} party: from one strange destination to the next, through unknowable environments, the mere sight of which could drive one to madness.

traits.locale_text: コモラフの実体を持った脅威がローグトレーダーとその一行の背後に迫り、目の前にはゼノの案内なくしては開かない、長く険しい旅路が待ち受けていた。次から次へと足を踏み入れる未知の目的地と予測できない環境は、見ているだけで気が狂いそうだ。

languages.text: Ayant laissé derrière eux les horreurs de Commorragh, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et son entourage entamèrent un voyage long et éreintant, qui eût été impossible sans l'aide d'un guide xénos et qui les conduirait d'une destination étrange à une autre, dans des environnements mystérieux dont la simple vue pourrait suffire à plonger certains dans la folie.
languages.original_text: With the physical horrors of Commorragh behind them, a long and arduous journey, possible only with the help of a xenos guide, lay ahead for the Rogue Trader and h{mf|is|er} party: from one strange destination to the next, through unknowable environments, the mere sight of which could drive one to madness.

traits.locale_text: Ayant laissé derrière eux les horreurs de Commorragh, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et son entourage entamèrent un voyage long et éreintant, qui eût été impossible sans l'aide d'un guide xénos et qui les conduirait d'une destination étrange à une autre, dans des environnements mystérieux dont la simple vue pourrait suffire à plonger certains dans la folie.

languages.text: Die Schrecken von Commorragh lagen hinter ihnen, aber {mf|den Freihändler und seine|die Freihändlerin und ihre} Gruppe erwartete eine lange und anstrengende Reise, die nur mit der Hilfe eines Xenos als Führer zu bewältigen war: von einem seltsamen Ziel zum nächsten, durch kaum erfassbare Umgebungen, deren Anblick alleine viele in den Wahnsinn treiben konnten.
languages.original_text: With the physical horrors of Commorragh behind them, a long and arduous journey, possible only with the help of a xenos guide, lay ahead for the Rogue Trader and h{mf|is|er} party: from one strange destination to the next, through unknowable environments, the mere sight of which could drive one to madness.

traits.locale_text: Die Schrecken von Commorragh lagen hinter ihnen, aber {mf|den Freihändler und seine|die Freihändlerin und ihre} Gruppe erwartete eine lange und anstrengende Reise, die nur mit der Hilfe eines Xenos als Führer zu bewältigen war: von einem seltsamen Ziel zum nächsten, durch kaum erfassbare Umgebungen, deren Anblick alleine viele in den Wahnsinn treiben konnten.

languages.text: Commorragh'ın fiziksel dehşetini geride bırakan Hür Tacir ve grubunu yalnızca zeno bir rehberin yardımıyla tamamlanabilecek, uzun ve zorlu bir yolculuk bekliyordu. Bu yolculuk; ardı ardına garip istikametlere, yalnızca görüntüsü bile insanı delirtebilecek, bilinmez ortamlara yapılacaktı.
languages.original_text: With the physical horrors of Commorragh behind them, a long and arduous journey, possible only with the help of a xenos guide, lay ahead for the Rogue Trader and h{mf|is|er} party: from one strange destination to the next, through unknowable environments, the mere sight of which could drive one to madness.
